text: Madison is a city in the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of Lake County. It became a city in 1885, and 6,474 people lived there at the 2020 census. Madison is home to Dakota State University. == References == == Other websites == *City of Madison website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1885 establishments in the United States Category:1880s establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Madison, South Dakota
